description:
The 3CX VoIP Phone is a free softphone app available for Windows. Connect the app
      to a VoIP Provider to make calls to any mobile or landline number, just as you would from
      your desk phone. Installing the 3CX VoIP Phone is easy and only takes a few minutes. There
      is no licensing fee and you are not tied to a particular VoIP provider. The user interface
      is simple and easy to use.

      Features
        Available for Windows
        Ability to choose several popular phone interfaces
        Automatically provision the settings
        Blind Transfers
        Record calls
        Shows personal call log / history
        Supports G.711, GSM and Speex codecs
        Supports standard USB and JABRA headsets (Windows)
        Works with popular VoIP Providers
summary: 3CX Windows VoIP Phone For VoIP Providers
author: 3CX
